member.name: POLICY_PRIMARY_DOMAIN_INFO
member.summary: The PolicyPrimaryDomainInformation value and POLICY_PRIMARY_DOMAIN_INFO structure are obsolete. Use the PolicyDnsDomainInformation and structure instead.

member.name: POLICY_PRIMARY_DOMAIN_INFO.Name
member.summary: An structure that specifies the name of the primary domain.

member.name: POLICY_PRIMARY_DOMAIN_INFO.Sid
member.summary: Pointer to the SID of the primary domain.
